name: Waveform (itch) (Philipp Labner)
description:
Newmen, robots made for making the lifes of humans easier, have been captured by a strange signal sent out by the Holy Mountain, a radio tower broadcasting this mysterious wave. It turned the Newmen against their creators and humanity is at the edge of extinction. In order to capture the Holy Mountain and stop the broadcast the humans created a Bando, a warrior able to manipulate the omnipresent waves sent by the tower, impacting the flow of your environment. Use his abilities in order to defeat the defense systems and enemies in your way!

Created by: Alexander, Adin Besic, Philipp Forstner, Thomas Fürst, Philipp Labner
